tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah_golde: "I shall bring order to all. Even if it is the silence of death."
Direct strikes are nullified. Instead, the unleashed chains bypass defenses to inflict fatal structural failure.
Left-click to fire chains from surrounding portals. Automatically locks onto targets near your crosshair.
Hold Right-Click to deploy portals; release to fire a salvo of up to 8 chains at nearby enemies.
Targets pierced by this authority are forcibly marked with +1 Sin.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.lore1: The cycle of the Law turns, and it shall surely pay you your due.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.press_ctrl: Press Ctrl to view the Codex (Sin Details)
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.w: Imperfect strikes are forbidden. Attacking without a full cooldown meter is a sin.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.t: Mercy is forbidden. Bathe in blood. Failing to attack for 5 seconds warrants death.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.s: Clamor is forbidden. Sprinting is a sin.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.r: Stagnation is forbidden. Keep moving. Stopping for even a moment warrants death.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.p: Flying in the sky with irreverence is a sin.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.h: Retreat is forbidden. Look forward. Showing your back or crouching warrants death.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.e: Coveting is forbidden. It is a sin to take possessions.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.sin.v: Starvation is forbidden. Devour endlessly. Letting your hunger deplete warrants death.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.codex: *As sins deepen, the Law inverts into 'Compulsion'...
You are no longer permitted to stop. Life lies only at the end of slaughter.
tooltip.qliphoth_armaments.geburah.passi: Sin system active when full set is equipped. Max Sins: 12. Imposes the Law on surrounding entities.
Drastically enhances physical capabilities when Sins are 7+. Sins mutate into more aggressive forms.
§b§l≪ Justice Core Shattered ≫ Forced purification of Sins.
§7(Remain sinless, and the Core shall be reconstructed...)
Passive: This weapon deals no direct damage, but its shockwaves on attack are devastating.
Fires a chain at the target in your crosshairs, pulling them towards you.
A single sword housing both fire and ice, once held by the last king. It embodies the authority and glory of his kingdom.
item.qliphoth_armaments.seraphim_railgun: A fusion of tuning fork and lightning technologies.
After a long charge, it fires a devastating laser beam forward. Because it is constantly overcharged, it has strong recoil and causes vision to shake.
"Handle with care! Destroys terrain spectacularly." - From a mysterious note found on the back of the railgun.
item.qliphoth_armaments.seismic_axe.lore: A battle axe distributed to a loyal subordinate
item.qliphoth_armaments.mw_item.r_skill_: Creates a shock wave that spreads forward.
item.qliphoth_armaments.conductors_requi: The conductor of lightning, who has waited for eternity.
While holding this weapon, a small familiar that fires bolts of lightning will aid you.
Commands the familiar to shoot a piercing bolt at your target.
After a short charge, unleashes a devastating laser, inflicting immense damage to all in its path.
This laser is difficult to block by conventional means.
The familiar encircles a target, scorching them with lightning.
§8Fuse with a Lightning Core to unleash its true power.
§7Familiar: §eAttacks become faster and arc to nearby enemies.
§7Skill: §cEnemies hit by Thunderous Shot are stunned and weakened.
Conductor's Finale now calls down a lightning strike upon impact.
A symbol of a kingdom's fallen authority.
This weapon is imbued with Flame and Frost, dealing massive damage on contact.
Toggles between Flame and Frost modes.
Fires a projectile that creates an elemental shockwave on impact.
Fires a bolt corresponding to the current element. Damage increases the longer you aim.
item.qliphoth_armaments.fuse: §8Fuse with %s to unleash its true power.
